channel.title: Adding the sendQuest("@yel@Yes, x); X = anim code part! To your Client.java
channel.description: Well, I managed to get all the Emote cases thanks to LeScape and x0. Now I just need to add them (in order) to my update() part in my client.java. I tried doing it myself 3 different ways but they dont' appear. Any suggestions/ideas?
